summary: Implements an end‑to‑end workflow that converts natural‑language prompts into short video clips using a zero‑shot text‑to‑video model, handling model loading, configuration management, and inference execution.
business_intent: Enable companies and developers to generate custom video content from textual descriptions without the need for model training, supporting use cases such as marketing, advertising, e‑learning, and rapid prototyping of visual media.
